name: Tri Die
description:
Soundtrack by Judah Anttila Controls - 

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Avoid the deathly red triangles for sixty seconds and win the game! The only difficulty is that as one moves, the player grows larger. Minimize your movement while still aiming for the highest score. 

Tri Die was developed over the course of four days for the Bullet Hell Game Jam, though submission wasn't possible. I hope it can still be of enjoyment to those who find the game.
